name: Pablo
description:
Pablo's arms have been stolen by his evil twin brother Pueblo. Help Pablo work through platforming challenges, but beware: His brains can only take limited amount of commands before he explodes into a million bits. He should probably get that looked at. I mean I wouldn't want to explode from thinking too much. Well that's probably why I don't in the first place. Like, if Pablo was controlling me, would my head explode too if I can't take a break? That's a thing. We gave Pablo this handy meter you can look at and see where his breaking point is though. We don't want him to explode. 

Also we wanted to teach Pablo to dance, but we didn't have time. So that's sad.
